twitch_info.title: Highlight: 225+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: if only nojah were here
savage
yeah hello algosith
actually ive been watching your stream for 15 minutes already
hi xoryla
As you can see, I'm not quite up to 1.0 speed yet
but I'm working on it
well that was expected
you told you won't go for 1.0 speed in a week
yeah, I remember
I'm not sure how long it will take
idk maybe one more week
we will see
even after I switch to 1.0 on stream, I will still do 0.9 offstream
I think
i suppose it would be pretty hard to switch speeds every time
considering you need to get used to each of speed
yeah, it takes a bit
to its slow jumps and movements
but it's not a big deal, all things considered
and then immediately switch to a faster one
when I'm spending so long on the game anyways
even at 0.9 it feels so fast that you have to dodge stuff before you've even read it fully
these 15 minutes of watching the stream and not writing anything in chat were because i wanted to calm myself down after spending a hard time in afoth stage
i wanted to rest a bit and watch you dodging things
because afoth is literally demolishing me
yeah, take it easy
it's good to take a break when things get frustrating
pyun also seemed to struggle a lot with afoth
i thought after ao stage clear id pass the rest of avoidances like that's the easiest thing ive played
LUL
(im exaggerating surely)
but
avoidance humbles everyone
i never thought id struggle on afoth stage so much
seeing how much people love it
part of the reason I like to play only a few avoidances is because I think each one takes so much work anyways I might as well play really hard stuff
but that rainbow-colored second drop with its first attack
which i died on ~20 times already
how many hours so far?
goodness
that's quite a bit
yeah but i comparing to others stats
have you played any of the others yet?
ive cleared only lilly and ao
im planning to grind gureiga after afoth one
so im expecting at least more enjoyable grind
yeah, seems like the best plan
at least you will be more motivated to grind tomo stage because it will be the only thing between you and battlegrounds 100%
and yes, my statistics on the avoidance like total time or total deaths
is the thing i care more than everything else
and that's a big problem
it's basically the reason of my tilting moments
but I can't do anything with myself
yeah, and it's so random too. you can beat something really quickly, like you did with DS, or you can get stuck for a long time. So I think it's best to not worry at all about cleartime
yeah it would be really good if i didn't worry about it
but i can't
no matter how much im struggling to ignore my stats
that's just me
deadsplit also makes it hard to ignore your stats, considering it's designed to track all that. that's why I don't use it
i used deadsplit for destruction state only, because i obviously wasn't expecting a fast clear of this madness
I think it's interesting that you didn't give up once you realized how hard it was
i realized it on my 33th hour of the grind
that's the time i started using deadsplit
my early grind was basically the fall attack deaths and walk or die obliterating me
but i was just enjoying the time spent on it
and you just kept enjoying it until you suddenly cleared?
most of time yes
well, despite some
rage moments
did you think you were going to clear it during that grind?
like there was some when i ended my grind session, checked my poor stats on it and then seeing time i spent on it
i thought so but only after 100 hours of grind
minimum
interesting
I asked because I think many people don't think they can beat this at all
i enjoyed it so i didn't care much about clearing it or not
unlike in afoth stage......
that was meant to be cleared after 10-13 hrs of grind
in average
I think being able to simply enjoy avoidance while grinding it is very powerful
sadly many games are not enjoyable
yeah true
I was watching sin kun play "I wanna heal the no sense of direction" earlier and it just looked so boring
that's another ao game
well, to enjoy playing the avoidance for me there must be not so much aspects
a banger music, cool design and interesting attacks is enough for me
*afoth with its second drop goes to the exception list
It is pretty similar for me, except I would also add I don't want too much pattern. But even that list of 4 items eliminates a lot of games
oh, I just remembered, I want things to be difficult
so yeah, not much left for me to play
but you have some more options
like many sciurus or something
maybe*
im imagining how hard it is to make an enjoyable difficult avoidance
so much to balance
but with all that
save its difficulty
it must be very difficult indeed. Razzor has said that he doesn't think that he cold make an avoidance harder than mayumushi but as balanced as mayumushi is
casualcrap himself tried to balance scattered faith for a while, but as you can see, he didn't finish, and look how many issues it has
scattered faith was made by casual?
not technically
he asked sudalv to make it
then sudalv gave it to him and he tried to balance it
at some point he gave it to some other people, and it ended up on the archive
and as a result we got a top 7 hof avoidance BloodTrail
but it was not finished, in the sense that it was not balanced, and casual was not happy with that balance
yeah, I'm glad we have the game, but I would not have minded if casual had finished balancing it first before releasing it LUL
but he has other things to do
I am also interested in Galaxy Collapse, which was inspired by scattered faith
i saw ao failed the very last attack of galaxy collapse
seeing how much to read there
this avoidance seems
not fun
I think most people agree with you
i wonder what place in hof will this avoidance gain
if someone clears it
sin kun thinks it's harder than last tis
I'm not sure I agree
no say
I doubt casual would either
no way*
but sin kun has almost beaten last tis
so I guess he's just overestimating the difficulty of galaxy collapse, rather than underestimating last tis
I think it's inconceivable that ao would almost beat galaxy collapse in a few days if it were really harder than last tis
idk why but every time i open sinkun stream it goes very laggy
and basically impossible to watch
so I can't even observe him playing the game
strange, it's not an issue for me. I don't know why it would only happen for sin kun's stream
yeah, only with his streams
if you really want to watch his streams, you could download the vods with https://tleecher.com/
but only if it really matters to you
I use it to download casualcrap's streams for future reference
well actually I don't watch stream vods
that's fine
specially when the streamer speaks a different language
oh yeah, sin kun speaks mostly korean
I'm just listening to them as a background thing while doing my business
like your podcasts you're listening to rn
oh yes, we're alike in that aspect
sorry that my stream does not provide much to listen to
just to not sitting in a silence
but when the grind starts, you will hear more t pazolite
no worries, I enjoy sitting here
chatting with foreigners about things im interested in
sup
hi nojah
ðŸ‘‹
hi Xoryla
making any progress Algo?
you missed the prof talk about the whole islam progressivism thing
meh
yes nojah, I am doing better on 0.9 than before
making progress towards 1.0
@xoryla going back to galaxy collapse, I hope it's harder than mayumushi, which would make it #2 on hof. but it might not be. still, I bet it is
worst case it's easier than ds somehow
but I doubt it
it's pretty hard to compare a reading-based avoidance like galaxy collapse and a luck-based one
well most of time luck based
which one is luck based?
ds surely
i like to call it a luck based avoidance
I mean, if you call ds luckbased, surely galaxy collapse is as well?
do you think galaxy collapse is going to be more fair than ds?
I have concerns regarding that question
id like to call it a reading based
as well as scattered faith
like when there are just a lot of bullets on a screen and you have to read all it
I agree though, it's hard to compare difficulties when you have luck to factor in
like vox diamond absolute
max rates it as harder than ds, but casualcrap says it's only a little harder than regular vox diamond for him
vox diamond absolute is the casino of all casinos
just a lot more luckbased, obviously
yeah, that game is a total lottery
if someone only cares about popularity, all they have to do is grind that, and once they luck through it, everyone will be talking about it
yeah that's true
vox absolute clear would be poggers
I don't really want to play something that luckbased, since I'm more interested it getting better than getting impressive clears
well ds clear would grab two things at once
it makes you get better on avoidances
and that's an impressive clear as well
and also enjpyable i suppose
once I clear it, people will no longer think it's impressive Kappa
it will be all about mayumushi
or something
still, I agree, DS will be a nice clear to sit on while I'm playing galaxy collapse
so you're really interested in grinding collapse after ds? or I didn't get the idea
that's right
I like reading-based avoidances
that would be cool
and hard stuff
and galaxy collapse is really cool, like DS
I will have to decompile it and modify the practice tool to fix a few issues though
like how it positions you in the center for every attack, even though you almost always want to be in the corner
but please only after ds Kappa
oh yes, I will clear ds
no doubt
ds must be number 1 priority
and before I do anything else
in fact, I am not even playing Elden Ring, which is a game that I would probably love, because I want to beat ds so much
ds is dark souls in your message?
no, it's destruction state
or i don't get it
I want to beat destruction state so much I will not play any other game at all
not even elden ring
because elden ring is s bit similar to dark souls as i remember
I was actually a big dark souls fan before I started playing avoidance, that's all
ah i got it :)
i thought you said you want to beat dark souls so you'll like playing elden ring
lol, no, I had actually beaten dark souls in 015
but the point is that all games you're playing rn is only destruction state
yes, that's right
I do find it amusing that they have the same acronym, "DS"
deadsplit has also the same acronym!
you know
oh goodness
so many things
im using ds to play ds after playing ds
LUL
sadly neither destruction state nor dark souls can run on the nintendo ds
it has only 4 megabytes of ram
my dream is crushed
trueeer
ds on the ds would actually be really cool
destruction state, that is
if only ds would support ds as well
the low resolution would be a problem though
you would probably have to make a low res version specially for the ds
the problem with dark souls on the ds is that there is no good way to control the camera
dark souls requires more buttons than the ds can offer
unfortunately i don't know anything about dark souls and nintendo ds
that's okay
I'm an avoidance player now
so we can just talk avoidance
let's talk about avoidance!
I mean, avoidance has such a high skillcap, much higher than dark souls
avoidance avoidance avoidance avoidance avoidance avoidance
that's one big reason why I play avoidance
I felt that if I played it for the rest of my life, I would not get tired of it
same
unless it goes for smashing a keyboard
like it was
today
with me
sadly, I think the difficulty is what scares most people from playing it, even in the fangame community, which is already very niche. so the genre is not popular
I would never smash my beautiful keyboard LUL
same but i was too nervous today, i wasn't even expecting such a thing from myself
yeah, It's very tough sometimes
especially when you know you can beat an avoidance, but are having trouble
near then end of the fish play-through I got pretty mad more often than usual
i got my hyperx alloy fps a couple of months ago after using a membrane keyboard for 7 years
do you like it?
you can't even imagine how good i felt
using mechanical one
well, I got a mechanical keyboard after using a membrane one for even longer, so in fact I can LUL
I really think mechanical keyboards are the way keyboards should feel
all my major clears like k3 ex stage, ds, ao stage happened with my mechanical keyboard
you manage to do more precise dodges
one frame movements started being more accessible
along with small jumps and cancels
that's cool
I didn't notice, since I was bad at avoidance at the time
well, I still am, but not as bad as I used to be
don't even know what i would do in ex hades with my bloody b120 that feels like plasticine
geez, that's kind of expensive for a membrane keyboard LUL
I just played on a standard dell office keyboard before
i found out madtermaxify did 100% k3 with an office keyboard
that's impressive
what a champ
riz must have been torture
oh not riz
rz
what fps are you at
anyway the issue of my mechanical keyboard is that keycaps start to lose its dye after mashing them for a long time
45 @Ubur
this is an indicator that the keyboard is of poor quality
speedin up ðŸ’ª
sorry, I was busy beating the game Kappa
that's right, full speed soonish maybe
but slow and stead is my motto
@xoryla yeah, my keyboard has keycaps printed with a process that is supposed to prevent that
dye-sublimation I think
so my kboard started looking kinda funny when all keycaps are normal and only arrow keys are almost transparent
that's funny
you know what keys the owner presses on more
now hopefully your keyboard will last much longer
yeah, the arrow keys are going to get a lot of use
maybe the jump key as well
but not as much
my jump key is up arrow
i have different controls
so you play one-handed?
yep
pretty convenient
now you can title all your vidoes "*hard avoidance clear* (onehanded)"
SeemsGood true
I think nader also plays onehanded
personally, that's not a control scheme I have ever desired to use
I chose to put jump and movement on different hands
that's convenient not only because you can hold your hand already on R or Z key
I rebound reset to x
for that reason
jump is v
also because you can play and drink water at the same time
and some other keys for canceling
okay, that is convenient
as i was doing while grinding rukito in k3 back in 2021
on the other hand, I'm not sure if I could actually play well while doing that
while needling that's ok
for avoidances you have to be a genius with that much of multitasking
yeah, it seems like it would be too much to think about
im cancelling by using num 8 key pressed with my little finger
oh, you use numpad for movement too?
seems like a cancer
numpad for cancelling only
how do you reach num 8 if you're not using numpad for movement?
seems like it must be pretty far from you movement keys
i said already it seems like cancer LUL
you should probably use num 0 LUL
or you could also rebind
but i have enough distance between arrow keys and num8
num0 is convenient for shift jumpers
are you lefthanded?
righthanded actually
I'm just trying to understand how you can move with the arrow keys while pressing num8 with your pinky LUL
weirdness, isn't it?
it's crazy
why did  you pick that key?
I don't understand that
hahah true  ive been playing with these controls since my first meeting with fangames
I don't know lol that's just me who has strange preferences
interesting
my keybinds are so tame
the weirdest thing I've ever done is put jump on "delete"
I cleared fish that way
then I switched my controls again
now I've got movement on numpad and jump on v
jump on delete
something i never thought about
it's fairly comfortable if you use wasd for movement
considering I don't even remember where is delete key exactly positioned
wolfiexe, who uses wasd for movement, puts jump on left arrow or something weird
because I don't use it
delete is to the right of \ on my keyboard
so above the arrow keys
oh ok i remembered
does your carpal accidentally presses arrow keys when you use delete for jumping
no
my palm is over the arrow keys
and it's also far above them
I don
I don't rest it on the keyboard
or more accurately, it was like that when I had delete as jump
I only switch to my current setup because I thought it would be better to have more precise movement for avoidance than precise jumping, so I put movement on my right hand, which is my dominant one
but ultimately, I think it is mostly personal preference
so this means fish doesn't need you to do precise movements so you can move using wasd
no, it just means I changed my mind
in fact, both games require some precise movements
oh, reasonable
actually, I switched controls during the fish grind
I starting playing fangames using controls more similar to what I'm using now
jump on left hand and movement on arrow keys
I have never been afraid to experiment with keybindings LUL
i think if i switch controls to classic ones
like shift for jump
i will not clear even the easiest needle
im not even saying anything about avoidances
yeah, immediately after you switch controls, it is very hard to do anything
even now, with all that fish experience, I am better at needle with the more standard jump on left hand setup
on account of all the time I spent doing needle in k3 and melanzana
on other thing I'd like to note
is that ao using his middle finger to press the right arrow key
not his ring finger
he would be in trouble if he played a game that required more than just right and left
im using only two fingers for three arrow keys
thumb on right arrow
ok, you have him beat
forefinger for left arrow
I played some games that actually require all four movement keys, so I never developed a nonstandard style like that
ok i basically made a mistake, everything is alright
3 fingers for 3 keys
my middle finger goes for jumping on up arrow
and a little finger for num8 cancelling BloodTrail
wait, how do you have your middle finger on up arrow, with your forefinger on right arrow?
forefinger for the left one
a thumb for the right one
I guess the num8 thing is starting to make more sense to me now, with that crazy setup
and yeah i can show you my hand and fingers position tomorrow
because it is the easiest one to press
I have a good idea of it now, but I will try to catch the stream
what time will it be?
if you want
since I am almost finished for today anyways
not the stream, id like to put a photo of my hand pos
I don't have webcam
unfortunately
right, that makes sense
I will try to play with that hand position right now, just for laughs
lets see how I do
but it would be a pleasure to have you watching ny stream
although it happens pretty rarely
oh so youre playing with this pos rn?
yes
i feel it Kappa
it's pretty hard to get used to, naturally
god it's terrible
forefinger=left, middle finger=up, thumb=right
but clearly it works for you
yes, I was faithfully copying your postion
it's a nightmare
LUL
probably
I'm sure I would get used to it after a while though, hypothetically speaking
but it might hurt my hand
though i don't know how did you rebind keys so quickly
for me to rebind i need to at least reboot the system
I already have arrow keys bound to movement
I mean, that's the default
and up arrow for jump?
oh crap, I forgot that one
sorry, I did not fully experience your setup
but I can rebind that in two seconds
you were jumping on v with your middle finger B)
ok, it took longer than two seconds
because I was bad at coding
I use autohotkey
wow it's even harder
ok how it feels
bad
LUL
I doubt I could make a worse control scheme for me if I tried
cool
maybe putting it all on my left hand is the only way to make it harder than this
let's try attack 3 then call it quits for the day
with your control scheme
nice first try LUL
youre basically fulljumping
yeah, it's the only way I can keep up
close
